text: Halvard Hanevold (3 December 1969 – 3 September 2019) was a Norwegian biathlete. He was born in Asker, Norway. Hanevold won an Olympic gold medal at the 1998, 2002 and in 2010. He also won two silver medals in 1998 and in 2006. He also won a bronze medal in 2006. Hanevold died on 3 September 2019 in Asker at the age of 49.Halvard Hanevold (49) er død ==References== ==Other websites== * Database Olympics Category:1969 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympians for Norway Category:Olympic silver medalists for Norway Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Norway Category:Olympic gold medalists for Norway
title: Halvard Hanevold
